I did change something related to this with bug 59481

Fixed. Changes in HcrTests. It appeared there was some problem with saving the 
compilation unit's buffer programatically with an editor opened (buffer 
sharing?). I noticed that once & a while a dialog opened saying the underlying 
resource had changed (beneath the editor). To keep the editor/CU in synch, I 
added code to close all editors before saving the CU in the test.

Looks like our breakpoint went missing. I'm not sure why - when I do the test 
manually, it works (the breakpoint remains). However, I fixed the test by 
removing the breakpoint and re-creating the breakpoint before/after the HCR 
operation, in the test.
